scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This disbound scrapbook consists of photos, leaflets, flyers, postcards, uniform patches, a poster (folded), and copies of the New Masses. Some post-SCW material memorializing the International Brigades in Mexico. Also included is Friends of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade social service support information for volunteers returning to New York City in 1939.
